Hatch a Design!

1. In order to provide goods at reasonable costs, our designers give us the minimum number of orders required before they can begin manufacturing.
2. Our community of design enthusiasts join to help hatch the product by meeting the designer's minimum order.
3. Once the minimum order is met, our designers go into manufacturing and prepare to ship the goods to you.
